content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Munich, let me start with a higher than expected figure to test your response — 1500 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the proposed price. However, I don't want to continue the negotiation because the amount appears significantly higher than what I anticipated for a newly built, unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany
